mapper.insert: insert into stockoutrecord (stockOprationBill_id, state, auditor, details) values (#{stockOprationBillId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, stockOprationBill_id, state, auditor, details from stockoutrecord
